news.title: Gentoo Linux 1.4 for PowerPC now available for pre-order

body.p: Our new Gentoo Store is now now accepting pre-orders for Gentoo Linux 1.4 for PowerPC, PowerPC G3, PowerPC G4, and the KDE/GNOME PowerPC LiveCD, which now contains both desktop environments on one CD. Thanks to the Gentoo PowerPC team for their excellent work!
